prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a powerful claw and a star-shaped ornament on its head.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines features of a crab and a lobster, featuring vibrant red colors.
Generate a creature with a fierce appearance and aquatic abilities, emphasizing its scissor-like claws.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in both urban and aquatic environments, with a striking blue and red color scheme.
Design a Pokemon that has a regal presence, showcasing its claws and unique star accessory.
Give me a water and dark-type Pokemon that has a robust body and a commanding look.
Make a Pokemon that reflects the rugged nature of the sea and is known for its combat skills.
